name: Pumpkin (burakmoody)
description:
This game is all about protecting the Pumpkin. 

You must harvest fruits and feed the Pumpkin before it dies.

How to play

WASD movement

Left-click attack

Right-click or Spacebar harvest

In the right corner, you see your backpack; it can maximum has 50 fruits, so be careful be with that. To feed the Pumpkin, stand on it. After you feed the Pumpkin, you will see its health bar will increase.

I made this game by following the course "The Most Comprehensive Guide To Unity Game Development Vol 1", published on udemy by Awesome Tuts.

Awesome tuts youtube channel Awesome Tuts
